event.caption: May 03 2009 02:45:20 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Good night, DC and thanks for a great Journey!

event.caption: May 03 2009 01:30:10 EDT
event.title: journeydc: 63 survivors and counting!

event.caption: May 03 2009 01:05:53 EDT
event.title: journeydc: If anyone has found a walkie talkie please call 410 382 0934. ask for jeremy.

event.caption: May 03 2009 00:28:34 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Cp3 heart cp4.

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:17:14 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The bonus checkpoint is closing down!

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:09:27 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The largest team, Stimulus Package has made it past the recession.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:55:29 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Fairy leaving cp3 with crowd and moving to cp5.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:45:51 EDT
event.title: journeydc: One member of the Monkey Fighters has made it for the second team!

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:43:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Good player fairy arrived at cp3. Still needed at 5?

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:24:24 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Still waiting for a second team to finish. Who will it be?

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:08:55 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Chasers at chk 3 are on scare mode to enable passage for a bit.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:07:05 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The fairy strikes!

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:49:13 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Good player fairy requested at chk 3. Camping chasers. Advise.

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:40:16 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The first to sign up for the journey are the first to finish. Congratulations Fireteam Camelot!

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:29:39 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Relay is sneaky and interesting. I approve of such vision. Also doesn't eliminate being caught.

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:00:23 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Can we get chasers to wait for marines at chk 5? They are fast and dangerous

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:59:12 EDT
event.title: journeydc: 3 marine at chk 4

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:54:46 EDT
event.title: journeydc: About half of you guys have made it to the first checkpoint but this game is far from over!

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:29:19 EDT
event.title: journeydc: For those of you who make it past the Bureaucracy the code is 2-0-2...

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:07:14 EDT
event.title: journeydc: DC Runners away!!!

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:04:03 EDT
event.title: journeydc: We're waiting for Chicago folks.

event.caption: May 02 2009 18:55:52 EDT
event.title: journeydc: People are already signing in. Come get your maps and ribbons.

event.caption: May 02 2009 16:01:58 EDT
event.title: journeydc: It's not an event until someone tries to sabotage it! The game is still on. Lace up your running shoes and bring plenty of paranoia.

event.caption: May 02 2009 00:00:07 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Remember, turn your device updates on for in-game info! Henceforth, teams will not be announced so as not to flood your inboxes.

event.caption: May 01 2009 23:57:51 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'B+' who strive for slightly above mediocrity.

event.caption: May 01 2009 23:57:24 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Antagonists' and 'Native Madness'. If you cross their paths, run!

event.caption: May 01 2009 23:56:18 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Swine Flu Over the Cuckoo's Nest' who use international pandemics for literary puns.

event.caption: May 01 2009 23:54:58 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Get to the Choppah' and 'The A-Team'. Sorry guys, choppers and GMC vans are not permitted.

event.caption: May 01 2009 23:52:12 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Willie's Pleasure Poles & Tire Rotation' who come second for longest name to the Preppy Princesses... etc.

event.caption: May 01 2009 23:47:58 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Superfreak'. The kind of group you don't take home to mother.

event.caption: May 01 2009 22:08:24 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Get ready to run. Another chaser has been released. Meet the Goddess of Squeegee. http://www.survivedc.com/navigate

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:47:12 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Monkey Fighters', 'Tourists', and 'Super Drunk Fantastiks', making the streets a messy and crowded place to be.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:46:03 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Seneca' and 'Lemon Lyman'. Don't be intimidated by their names, folks.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:42:33 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Survivants' and 'Onslaught' who are at odds with each other.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:41:00 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Stuart Raiders'. Look into the face of fear. http://www.tinyurl.com/stuartraiders

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:37:02 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Funtastik', which is a great way to sum up the game.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:36:22 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Brothers from Another Mother' who know chasers are no match for fraternal instincts!

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:32:45 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Gabriel', 'The TMA', and 'Friend's Club'. That's more than 100 groups so far.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:30:55 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Crunchy Tigers' who remind us all of cereal.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:30:30 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Mayfair Fund'. Watch out for gorgeous people who may be dolls.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:28:04 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Duck' which is good advice for players hiding from chasers... and restaurant patrons.

event.caption: May 01 2009 21:27:09 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Thriving Moes'. It's good to see something is thriving in this economy.

event.caption: May 01 2009 20:17:07 EDT
event.title: journeydc: This time tomorrow, you won't be looking at DC the same way again.

event.caption: May 01 2009 15:24:48 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @prcizmadia But you don't know the land mine sequence we've planned on Connecticut Ave.

event.caption: May 01 2009 14:25:43 EDT
event.title: journeydc: DC players still have time to reach out to Chicago players. When running at night, it's best to use the buddy system http://is.gd/u57D

event.caption: May 01 2009 10:29:24 EDT
event.title: journeydc: That's right, @WheeKris - we run rain, shine, swine flu, may day riot, zombie takeover, biblical flooding, or titan awakening. Prepare.

event.caption: May 01 2009 10:04:00 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Journey gets local love: http://is.gd/vQSV

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 22:36:57 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Do Not Go Gentle'. Getting caught before reaching at least half the checkpoints will be considered gentle. Good night!

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 22:28:02 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes '4916', also known as 1001100110100.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 22:20:26 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Plissken's Army'. Escape from DC may not be so easy.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 22:18:21 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Way We Roll', here to show you how a person rolls down Capitol Hill.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 21:57:29 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the 'Hill-billies' who loaded up the truck and moved DC. Set a spell. Take your shoes off. Y’all come back now, y’hear?

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 21:53:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Preppy Princesses and their Naughty Prince' who will perform perfectly for the prize.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 18:06:03 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team Manbearpig', who have mutated to avoid swine flu.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 18:05:17 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Bout Mbarrassing' who aren't afraid to be bashful.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 18:03:26 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Genie', leaving the lamp for the first time in centuries.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 18:02:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Yorglow Winsey' to the race. My glow winsey what?

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 17:59:08 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Pas a Deux'. Bonus points for dancing to each checkpoint!

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 17:57:57 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Da Despoz' to the mean streets of DC.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 17:54:01 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Lose Badly to Jon's Team'. All journey players are winners in our book.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 14:16:23 EDT
event.title: journeydc: PUBLIC SERVICE ADDRESS: Rumors of a secret 'Mothra Sequence' have been coming out of Chicago. We can neither confirm nor deny its existence.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 11:28:55 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Secret File #5: The first checkpoint will be to the southeast of Dupont Circle.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 11:16:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Secret file #4 has been destroyed. Lost file segment: Anyone can enter safe zones. No one can get caught. Elevators and escalators are safe.

event.caption: Apr 30 2009 11:00:20 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @broonswick You can just show up, but you should register. This way we'll know how to notify your next of kin.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 21:12:48 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Prilosec OTC' who have kissed heartburn good night so they can go kick some butt!

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 21:07:54 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Geographriends'. They get down with latitudes and hang out with legends.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 20:51:39 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team High Five'. High fiving chasers will earn you an orange ribbon!

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 17:43:06 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @readysetdc A modest count comes to more than 50 teams currently registered. DC won't have pavement left after Saturday.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:50:53 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Mantids'. Don't mistake their prayer-like stance for pacifism.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:47:06 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Snuggie Squadron', voted most likely to fall asleep while running.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:40:56 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team Awesome'. They really are.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:32:37 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Over Thirties', here to tell you to get off the White House lawn!

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:29:14 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Pi Kapp' who plan to run circles around the competition.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:27:11 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Ugly Purple Banshees' that shriek violetly when you're about to be tagged.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:21:38 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team Dickel'. Watch out for these Whisky Dicks staggering around on course.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 16:17:42 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Park Roadsters'. Chasers watch out for pairs of people in parks!

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 15:48:45 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team Stumpfabulous'. One too many run-in's with Chasers will do that to you.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 14:23:28 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes team 'Punk Rock Time'. Cause as much chaos and disruption as possible but don’t let them take you alive.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 12:33:39 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Secret file #3: You must rely on your own two feet and the metro system, but a secret bonus may allow bus access...

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 12:25:46 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Prime Dubai Real Estate'. Be on the lookout for ghost towns and islands shaped like other things.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 12:23:41 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Ming's Group'. If they're anything like the dynasty, they won't collapse until the chasers get over the Great Wall.

event.caption: Apr 29 2009 12:19:38 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Terrorist Fist-Jabbers', who say hello with their fists!

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 20:34:30 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The night draws near and the second chaser is waiting. Meet The Oncoming Storm. http://www.survivedc.com/navigate

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 20:21:42 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @alphabetically The race doesn't start until Saturday night. Are we missing a free happy hour or something?

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 19:15:34 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Street Runnaz'. Keep all actual running off major roadways!

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 19:14:55 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Gaam Sing Kwoon' and their mantis style.

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 19:14:04 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team Matador'. Please leave chasers' ears intact!

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 17:09:28 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @WheeKris JourneyDC belatedly (forcibly) welcomes team 'Fusion' to the race. Eager beavers run right into Chaser traps.

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 15:34:02 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team ABC' and 'The Five Year Olds'. This ain't your usual play date.

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 15:01:15 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Secret File #2: Rumor is there's been some Good Player Fairy sightings in DC. Find this character and you'll be protected from Chasers.

event.caption: Apr 27 2009 22:25:39 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Crazy 88's' to the race. Are there really 88 of them, or do they just think the name sounds cool?

event.caption: Apr 27 2009 20:28:17 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @Minger Chicago & DC Journey are running concurrently this year. Get a friend running there or connect that night for special instructions.

event.caption: Apr 27 2009 17:20:00 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @mcortina Chasers may be better described as the wraith-like creatures known as 'Dementors'. Their prison is DC & you're trying to escape.

event.caption: Apr 27 2009 16:42:12 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Bros for the Win'. With a name like that, you can't lose either way.

event.caption: Apr 27 2009 16:21:39 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @Minger Chasers can do anything they like except enter safe zones. Think of them as Raptors using coordinating attack patterns.

event.caption: Apr 27 2009 11:10:11 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @Minger Sure, send your game questions. We'll try to make our answers both vague and intimidating (in keeping with overall race conditions)

event.caption: Apr 26 2009 22:31:34 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Secret File #1: There will be a method to make it tougher for chasers who stakeout checkpoints.

event.caption: Apr 26 2009 21:59:56 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Team Rufus'. Look both ways before crossing the street!

event.caption: Apr 26 2009 21:43:01 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Doubleclickers' who have racked up hours in simulation training.

event.caption: Apr 26 2009 21:38:51 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the chicken of the sea, 'Team Tunafish'.

event.caption: Apr 25 2009 01:07:48 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @itwasstinky This is a squad of elite chasers who have trained for months and have special skills. You missed tryouts.

event.caption: Apr 24 2009 23:11:52 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The first chaser has been unleashed! Meet Guapo. http://www.survivedc.com/navigate

event.caption: Apr 24 2009 16:58:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Patrick Swayze's Nipples' who are standing in for his liver.

event.caption: Apr 24 2009 16:58:28 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the 'Snuggie Pirates'. Can't wait to see the Good Ship La-Z-Boy on its maiden voyage.

event.caption: Apr 24 2009 16:19:19 EDT
event.title: journeydc: PUBLIC SERVICE ADDRESS: Secret information feeds may become available during the race; having twitter on your phone will help.

event.caption: Apr 23 2009 09:34:18 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Check in with Chi-town, our Sister City for Journey this year, and say hello to your fellow runners: http://is.gd/u57D

event.caption: Apr 23 2009 00:49:47 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @Leftsider It's still Chocolate City, we're just putting some Jalapeño and tread marks in it. Enjoy and we'll see you at the finish line!

event.caption: Apr 22 2009 16:18:39 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Appleheads.' The opposite of apple bottoms?

event.caption: Apr 21 2009 21:23:27 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'HMS Harlot'. Keep a look out for chasers in submarines.

event.caption: Apr 21 2009 21:12:59 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Stimulus Package' to the race. Donate to JourneyDC! http://www.survivedc.com/participate

event.caption: Apr 21 2009 11:30:17 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Run or Shoot? Both!' Please refrain from shooting chasers... unless they asked for it.

event.caption: Apr 21 2009 10:52:25 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Performax' to the race, who are known for their longer lasting pleasure.

event.caption: Apr 20 2009 13:10:23 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the 'Fitty Tuckers' who are nucking futs.

event.caption: Apr 20 2009 09:36:52 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The coveted Runner and Chaser trophies have arrived http://is.gd/ts5I

event.caption: Apr 19 2009 22:37:12 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Sexuality' to the race. We always have, in fact there's no point t if you don't end up tired, sweaty, & fully satisfied.

event.caption: Apr 19 2009 22:31:25 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the 'Lisa Frank Bandidos'. Chasers, hide your Trapper Keepers.

event.caption: Apr 18 2009 22:23:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Shenanigans!' to the festivities. Did someone call you?

event.caption: Apr 18 2009 00:28:29 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Ninjas'. Kunai and smoke bombs optional.

event.caption: Apr 17 2009 13:18:31 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Chaser Toolbox Item #35: Trapping runners in safe zones affords false sense of security & may result in panic or paranoia http://is.gd/sZ7n

event.caption: Apr 16 2009 09:45:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Phat Kidz'. Bring enough cheese curls for everyone & feel free to beatbox - makes it that much easier to find you.

event.caption: Apr 16 2009 08:49:15 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'May Day Zombies!' Please be accountable for any loss of limbs, as we are not insured.

event.caption: Apr 13 2009 22:31:35 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @juancow JourneyDC welcomes 'The X-ticles' and urges them to remember and obey the first rule: never take off robot pants.

event.caption: Apr 13 2009 10:51:35 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneDC welcomes 'Blue Barracudas'. Legend has it that this group could could win if not for the giant Olmec heads they insist on wearing.

event.caption: Apr 11 2009 11:00:11 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Chaser Toolbox Item: #12 Remember to request backup from fellow chasers who have the right equipment http://bit.ly/mFDso

event.caption: Apr 11 2009 00:24:28 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Marlowe Ink' to the race. Face tattoos may grant you an edge against the more bashful chasers.

event.caption: Apr 11 2009 00:19:33 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @kaitb1103 JourneyDC welcomes 'Loudon Valley' to the race. Save the drama for the end of the night.

event.caption: Apr 09 2009 13:42:41 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @karlee0805 JourneyDC welcomes 'The Headcrushers' & urges them to leave the head, arm, leg and any other body-part crushing to the chasers.

event.caption: Apr 09 2009 11:35:46 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Thread' to the race. Golden thread may not ensure you finding your way back home.

event.caption: Apr 08 2009 23:55:45 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Citizen X' to the race. Where the Soviets failed our chasers will triumph.

event.caption: Apr 08 2009 13:55:26 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Chaser Toolbox Item #47: Outlawed for players but very effective on the faster, front runners http://is.gd/rrQf

event.caption: Apr 08 2009 13:39:24 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Catch Me if You Can'. The ability to adapt to various jobs may just save their lives.

event.caption: Apr 07 2009 15:28:08 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'The Fast and Furious'. Although its more than a quarter mile runners are still allowed the use of nitrous oxide.

event.caption: Apr 07 2009 15:01:13 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @alchemybynight JourneyDC welcomes 'Zombie Squad'. And no one's gonna save them from the beast about strike...

event.caption: Apr 07 2009 11:42:24 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the group 'The Invisibles'. Chasers don't just appear to move faster than the speed of light, they actually do.

event.caption: Apr 07 2009 09:58:37 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Mangs' to the melee. Matching neck scarves are a must this journey season.

event.caption: Apr 06 2009 21:31:26 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes the group 'Kyuss'. I assume they will live up to their name by splitting up into other groups as the night progresses.

event.caption: Apr 06 2009 20:43:36 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @sticksngiggles You probably won't have to run through Anacostia, but just in case, bring along your chainsaw and Buddhist ideals.

event.caption: Apr 06 2009 17:10:50 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @RecessionistaDC Krafty is what you'll have to be...

event.caption: Apr 06 2009 15:12:41 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @Shaw1914 JourneyDC welcomes 'The 101'. Your group should take our 100-level class, 'Your Fear & You: Lacing Up Your Big Girl Running Shoes'

event.caption: Apr 06 2009 12:13:04 EDT
event.title: journeydc: @RecessionistaDC JourneyDC would like to point out that we are recession friendly with the chance of govt cheese at certain checkpoints.

event.caption: Apr 05 2009 23:31:12 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'We're Gonna Win' to the starting line. Remember: only one group member must survive. Plot accordingly.

event.caption: Apr 05 2009 21:54:37 EDT
event.title: journeydc: The first step towards reaching the end of the night is signing up. Congratulations.

event.caption: Apr 04 2009 21:04:06 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Four new challengers have entered the race. Let's see who comes out on top!

event.caption: Mar 31 2009 12:39:01 EDT
event.title: journeydc: JourneyDC welcomes 'Fireteam Camelot' to the race. You guys better deliver on your awesome name...

event.caption: Mar 17 2009 20:06:28 EDT
event.title: journeydc: Planning is underway for Journey to the End of the Night DC 2009. Prepare yourselves...

event.caption: May 03 2009 00:13:25 EDT
event.title: incircles: Faerie powers and battery waning... Headed to the end.

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:37:17 EDT
event.title: incircles: http://bit.ly/e8qzq

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:22:01 EDT
event.title: incircles: http://bit.ly/DjNSk

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:45:28 EDT
event.title: incircles: Meandering on...

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:35:05 EDT
event.title: incircles: Most festive memorial ever!

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:10:19 EDT
event.title: incircles: Why do the woodland creatures all scurry away? And without even saying a simple 'Hello'!

event.caption: May 02 2009 19:41:34 EDT
event.title: incircles: Materializing into the mundane worlds east of Faerie seems to have sprained my neck. Next time I'm taking the Amtrak.
